skills.title: Back-End
skills.description: Python, Java, C, SQL, MongoDB, Node.js

portfolio.title: SafeSteps
portfolio.description: A mobile app designed to help distracted students and pedestrians who needs to cross BU campus safely by providing discrete, location-based alerts as they approach in high density road intersections
portfolio.stack: React Native, Expo, Python(Django),FireBase, Figma, Arduino

portfolio.title: Harry Potter's Adventure With GPT2 And LSTM!
portfolio.description: Collaborated in a team of 2 to design two Neural Network models and analyze text generation of Harry Potter Novels between the two models. Utilized the huggingface GPT-2 pre-trained transformer neural network text generation model to finetune text generation for Harry Potter text. Designed a LSTM (Long Short Term Memory) Recurrent Neural Network using PyTorch from scratch to generate Harry Potter text based on the input text

portfolio.title: Music/Event Artist Generator
portfolio.description: A simple full stack web app designed for users to type in their music artist and generate a list of songs and events related to a searched artist utilizing Spotify API

portfolio.title: Letter Boxed Solver
portfolio.description: A java application capable of solving the New York Times Letter Boxed puzzle game
